name: pluggedin-random-number-generator
description: A cryptographically secure random number generator MCP server
long_description: The Plugged.in Random Number Generator MCP server provides state-of-the-art cryptographically secure random number generation for AI applications. It offers 7 specialized tools for generating integers, floats, bytes, UUIDs, strings, choices, and booleans using Node.js's crypto module.

tools.name: generate_random_integer
tools.description: Generate a cryptographically secure random integer

tools.name: generate_random_float
tools.description: Generate a cryptographically secure random float

tools.name: generate_uuid
tools.description: Generate a cryptographically secure UUID v4

tools.name: generate_random_string
tools.description: Generate a cryptographically secure random string

tools.name: generate_random_choice
tools.description: Make a cryptographically secure random choice

tools.name: generate_random_boolean
tools.description: Generate a cryptographically secure random boolean

prompts.name: generate_random
prompts.description: Help me generate random values using cryptographically secure methods
